last_episode_to_air.name: The Father
last_episode_to_air.overview: For the Playground and its inhabitants, it's time to settle scores.

name: Playground
overview: A lonely teenage girl joins a school for promising killers and trains hard to become an professional assassin as she uncovers the mysteries of her parents' death.

episodes.name: Amy
episodes.overview: A teenage girl joins a school for promising killers and trains to become an assassin as she uncovers the mysteries of her parents' death.

episodes.name: Playground
episodes.overview: After successfully passing the entrance exam to the Playground, Amy must adapt to the school's gruelling training program Young or not so young, no one is exempt. Kill or be killed, it's the only way.

episodes.name: Sweat and Blood
episodes.overview: Abducted in the middle of the night by hooded men, Amy will have to remember her training to pass a test with serious consequences.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.overview: Amy is sent out in the field for the first time on a very special mission.

episodes.name: Alone
episodes.overview: Amy tries to find out the truth about her parents' death, no matter the consequences.

episodes.name: Guilt
episodes.overview: While the headmaster is absent, the Playground's students set out on a quest for justice.

episodes.name: The Attack
episodes.overview: Amy and her Playground classmates fight back against ruthless mercenaries.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.overview: Back in the Playground, the Father decides to go rescue Hannah, and asks Amy to lend a hand.

episodes.name: Fire Baptism
episodes.overview: With the situation back to normal, the students anxiously await the end of their training.

episodes.name: The Father
episodes.overview: For the Playground and its inhabitants, it's time to settle scores.
